testsuite.name: Stat Entity Tests

testcase.name: Parameterized constructor should set all fields except statId
toString() should contain all stat information
Setters and getters should work correctly
toString() should handle null values gracefully
hashCode() should be equal for equal objects
Constructor with ID should set all fields
equals() should return true for stats with same content
equals() should return false for stats with different content
equals() should return false when compared to different type
equals() should return true when object is compared to itself
Should add and delete a stat
Default constructor should create empty stat
equals() should return false when compared to null
